item.title: 欧洲天然气价格随着即将到来的更多寒冷天气而波动
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格出现波动，因为交易商评估了天气转冷的预测，这可能会进一步考验该地区的天然气库存。【原文：European natural gas prices fluctuated as traders assessed forecasts for a return of colder weather that may further test the region’s inventories.】

item.title: 印度证券交易所面临清算公司提案带来的利润风险
item.description: 如果印度证券市场监管机构实施对清算所所有权结构的拟议改革，印度两大证券交易所的利润可能会下降。【原文：India’s two leading stock exchanges may see their profit drop should the nation’s stock-market regulator implement proposed changes to the ownership structure of clearing houses.】

item.title: 中国开发商万科寻求修改两笔银行贷款的条款
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，在长期的房地产危机导致财务状况恶化之后，中国万科集团公司正在寻求贷款人的批准，以改变两笔海外贷款的条款。【原文：China Vanke Co. is seeking lenders’ approval to change terms on two offshore loans, people familiar with the matter said, after its finances worsened amid a prolonged property crisis.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称摒弃巴塞尔协议的计划可能会失败
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）说，美国推动的任何搁置强化银行资本规则的做法都会出错，欧洲不应该冒险走这条路。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Mario Centeno said any US push to set aside enhanced bank capital rules will go wrong, and Europe shouldn’t risk taking that path.】

item.title: 俄罗斯秘密调换石油演习后希腊成为新热点
item.description: 在欧洲国家利用海军演习试图在一个地方阻止俄罗斯油轮在海上秘密调换燃料货物的活动后，这种活动又转移到了希腊沿海新的热点地区。【原文：The secret switching of Russian fuel cargoes between tankers at sea has migrated to new hotspots off the coast of Greece after the European country used naval drills to try and block the activity in one location.】

item.title: 印度新时代科技股首次获得指数支持，Zomato股价攀升
item.description: 投资者对 Zomato Ltd. 加入印度 BSE Sensex 指数表示欢迎，这标志着首家新时代科技公司加入了这一重要的股票指数。【原文：Investors applauded the addition of Zomato Ltd. to India’s BSE Sensex, marking the first new age technology company to join the key equity gauge.】

item.title: 在法国的新竞标中，阿托斯为资产出价高达 6.25 亿欧元
item.description: 在早些时候的国家收购要约到期后，法国政府提出以 5 亿欧元（约合 5.24 亿美元）的企业价值收购其认为具有战略意义的阿托斯 SE 部分股权，包括收益在内，收购价格可能高达 6.25 亿欧元。【原文：The French government has made an offer to buy parts of Atos SE it considers to be strategic for an enterprise value of €500 million ($524 million) and potentially up to €625 million including earnouts, after an earlier state offer expired.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团将在 38 亿美元交易中出售其余煤炭业务
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）表示，已同意将其炼钢煤业务出售给皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.【原文：Anglo American Plc said it’s agreed to sell its steelmaking coal business to Peabody Energy Corp. for a fee that could rise to as much as $3.78 billion, as the miner’s restructuring gathers pace.】

item.title: 利率上升，日本保险公司债券纸面损失翻倍
item.description: 由于利率攀升，日本四大人寿保险公司持有的国内债券的纸面损失比截至 3 月的财政年度增加了一倍多，尽管这些公司自 6 月以来已挽回了部分损失。【原文：Paper losses on domestic bonds held by Japan’s four major life insurers have more than doubled from the fiscal year ended March as interest rates climbed, though the firms recouped some of the losses since June.】

item.title: 莫迪在议会面对阿达尼问题时警告反对党
item.description: 在反对党议员要求就亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）进行辩论，迫使议会休会前不久，总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）呼吁和平进行议会程序。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi appealed for peaceful parliamentary proceedings shortly before opposition lawmakers demanded a debate about billionaire Gautam Adani, forcing proceedings to be adjourned.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司称 Uprades 将推动被淘汰喷气发动机的复兴
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）有信心恢复对其陷入困境的遄达1000发动机的需求，该发动机为波音公司的787客机提供动力，因为一些升级将提高该机型的耐用性并使其更具竞争力。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc is confident it can revive demand for its struggling Trent 1000 engine that powers Boeing Co.’s 787 airliner because some upgrades will improve durability and make the model more competitive.】

item.title: 孟加拉国将聘请律师事务所审查阿达尼交易等六项交易
item.description: 孟加拉国计划审查七项电力供应合同，其中包括在前总理谢赫-哈西娜执政期间与阿达尼电力有限公司签订的合同。【原文：Bangladesh plans to review seven electricity supply contracts, including the one with Adani Power Ltd., signed during former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina’s rule.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在五月以来最好的一周后上涨
韦丹塔发行美元债券，测试后阿达尼时代的印度需求
item.description: 就在阿达尼集团（Adani Group）创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）被美国起诉几天后，韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）将在两个月内第二次发行美元债券，以测试投资者对印度离岸债务的偏好。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd. is going ahead with its second dollar bond offering in two months, testing investor appetite for Indian offshore debt just days after the US indictment of Adani Group founder Gautam Adani.】

item.title: 中国《建筑时报》要求提供债务计划的资金细节
item.description: 香港一家法院命令时代中国控股有限公司比它所希望的更快地返回香港，就其清盘申请进行另一次听证，因为这家违约开发商的重组计划的可行性面临质疑。【原文：A Hong Kong court ordered Times China Holdings Ltd. to return more quickly than it wanted for another hearing on its liquidation petition, as the defaulted developer faced questions over the viability of its restructuring plan.】

item.title: 卡扎克称欧洲央行下月必须因经济不景气而降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）认为，欧洲中央银行应在下个月降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower interest rates next month, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 据说阿波罗支持的全球学校集团正在权衡股权出售事宜
item.description: Global Schools Holdings Pte.是一个国际学校网络，其支持者包括阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Global Schools Holdings Pte., a network of international schools with backers including Apollo Global Management Inc., is exploring options including a minority stake sale amid interest from prospective investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行利率不应长期受限
item.description: 首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）认为，欧洲央行应该能够在 2025 年将利率降至不再限制经济发展的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should be able to reduce interest rates to a level where they no longer restrict the economy in 2025, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 南部非洲国家遭遇多年来最严重停电事故
item.description: 津巴布韦电力公司（Zimbabwe Power Co.【原文：Zimbabwe and neighboring Zambia were plunged into darkness on Sunday because of a fault that Zimbabwe Power Co. said affected both southern African countries.】

item.title: 南非开发商计划斥资 10 亿美元打造旗舰中心
item.description: 南非房地产集团 Attacq Ltd. 已拨出 200 亿兰特（11 亿美元）的专款，用于进一步开发其位于约翰内斯堡郊区的旗舰项目瀑布城（Waterfall City）商业和物流中心。【原文：South African property group Attacq Ltd. has earmarked 20 billion rand ($1.1 billion) to further develop its flagship Waterfall City commercial and logistics hub on the outskirts of Johannesburg.】

item.title: 贷款紧缩导致泰国汽车产量创三年新低
item.description: 据泰国工业联合会（Federation Thai Industries）称，由于国内销售和海外出货量双双下滑，预计泰国今年将生产 150 万辆乘用车和卡车，这是自 2021 年大流行病肆虐以来的最低产量。【原文：Thailand is expected to produce 1.5 million units of passenger cars and trucks this year, the lowest total since pandemic-disrupted 2021, as both domestic sales and overseas shipments slide, according to the Federation of Thai Industries.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行发起对国内竞争对手 BPM 银行的收购要约
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）周一表示，已开始竞购国内竞争对手 Banco BPM。【原文：UniCredit SpA said Monday it has started a bid to take over domestic rival Banco BPM.】

item.description:
经过多年的自律，要求德国放松财政束缚的呼声日益高涨。【原文：

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率为近三年来最低
item.description: 由于医疗保健和娱乐价格涨幅放缓，新加坡10月份的核心通胀率放缓至2021年12月以来最弱的速度。【原文：Singapore’s core inflation in October slowed to the weakest pace since December 2021, as heathcare and recreation price gains eased.】

item.title: Adnoc 称天然气部门股份出售可释放巨大价值
item.description: 阿布扎比主要能源公司表示，通过出售更多股份，可以释放其天然气部门的巨大价值。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main energy company said significant value in its natural gas unit can be unlocked with an additional share sale.】

item.title: 莫迪领导的政党在重要邦的民意调查中获胜，印度股市延续涨势
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的印度人民党联盟周一在印度最富裕的马哈拉施特拉邦大获全胜，印度股票基准指数随之飙升。【原文：Stock benchmarks in India surged on Monday as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party-led alliance secured a thumping victory in the nation’s wealthiest state of Maharashtra.】

item.title: Edelweiss 聘请 Nomura 出售共同基金单位股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Edelweiss Financial Services Ltd. 已聘请野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Edelweiss Financial Services Ltd. has hired Nomura Holdings Inc. to help find a buyer for a minority stake in its mutual fund business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼 DIY 先生企业计划首次公开募股，筹资高达 2.97 亿美元
item.description: Mr DIY Group (M) Bhd 的印尼姊妹公司将在雅加达首次公开发行股票，寻求筹集多达 4.7 万亿印尼盾（2.97 亿美元）的资金，这将是印尼一年多来最大规模的上市活动。【原文：The Indonesian sister company of Mr DIY Group (M) Bhd. will list shares in Jakarta through an initial public offering that seeks to raise as much as 4.7 trillion rupiah ($297 million), in what would be the nation’s biggest listing in more than a year.】
